subject: Stalking (Crime)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: For the first time since a woman was arrested on charges of stalking Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman, he publicly addressed the issue, as well as the other pertinent ones involving his team.
snippet: For the first time since a woman was arrested on charges of stalking Yankees General Manager Brian Cashman, he publicly addressed the issue, as well as the other pertinent ones involving his team.
